title: The Villager Who Was Abandoned, Was Picked up by an Aristocrat and Awakened a Legendary Divine Skill - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Slice of Life
tags: Doting Parents   Dragons   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Magic   Male Protagonist   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnation   Royalty   Sword And Magic
author: Miki Nazuna   三木なずな
description:
An abandoned baby under the bridge was picked up by a high-ranking aristocrat to become his grandson.

The aristocratic old man loved the baby so much that he was doted by him and lived the most carefree life in the world without any inconvenience.

And it was not only the aristocrat who doted him, but the supreme power on earth the emperor also doted him.

Only this abandoned child was loved by all the powerful people as a「 Cute Grandson 」, and he eventually rises to the power.>
